utils¶

find_index_in_set¶

Converts returns the index of a value in a set as if it were a list Returns -1 if value was not in the set

Parameters:

Name

Description

Type

Default

value_set

target set

set

None

value

target value

any

None

Returns: int

Example:

from matritools import utils as mu

values = [1, 1, 2, 2, 3, 3 ]

index = find_index-in_set(set(values), 1)

if index != -1:
    print("Index of 1 is " + str(index)
    # output
    # Index of 1 is 0
else :
    print("1 is not in the set")
